title: Establishment of the Cabinet Sub-Committee on Economic Revival and 	Growth
decision_details: - Expeditious decisions have to be made on the steps to be taken for the economic revival and growth with high priority, amidsts the current economic crisis. As such, it has been found appropriate to establish a Cabinet Sub‑Committee on Economic Revival and Growth in order to make strategic directions for the national economic management activities. Accordingly, the proposal made by the Hon. President to appoint the said Committee under his chairmanship and comprising of 05 Cabinet Ministers including the Hon. Prime Minister, was approved by the Cabinet.
